situation: I am on short term disability and I am afraid I will lose my job if I don't go back soon.

dialog.text: Hello good afternoon.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Hi, good afternoon.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm feeling anxious that I am going to lose my job.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Losing a job is always anxious.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I hope I don't.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Why do you think you will lose your job?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am on short term disability and I am not ready to go back to work yet but I do not have any job protection.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh so your job is not protected and your short term disability will end soon? Is that correct?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's not ending yet, but no my job is not protected. I live in the United States, but I have not been at my job long enough to earn protection for medical leave.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: you have to have been here for a year, and I started November 2020
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm afraid that I will lose my job since I'm still on disability for the foreseeable future.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I see. Have you spoken to HR?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I have, but they are telling me that it is up to my department manager who isn't actually getting back to me about it yet.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Your department manager is not answering you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: No, I have sent them a few emails about it. It makes me nervous. I do not have a phone number to call and my psychiatrist really does not think I am ready to go back to the stress of my job.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I wish I could just call him, but I do not have a phone number for him. Just his email.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Have you tried mentioning that to HR?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: HR is the one who gave me his email.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I don't think he has a direct work line, and they're not allowed to give out personal information.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes that is how most employments work about providing personal information.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That in itself causes anxiety to most since other forms of communication is not possible especially if they are not responding to ciritcal matters.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes! 100%. Every time my phone rings I get nervous that I'm being fired and I'm worried I made a mistake going out on disability. I needed to though, but I'm nervous.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: No you should not have to feel you made a mistake for the time you are taking out of work for a necessity.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thank you for saying that. That does make me feel better. It sucks sometimes we have to choose between our health and our jobs. We don't get paid to take care of our health though, we only get paid to work.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You know yourself more than anybody and you need to take care of yourself.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: I have been in a depression since my father died last year. We have had to sell our home and move to a much smaller place due to losing his income. I am older but lived with my parents to help them because they are both ill. it has been an ongoing struggle

dialog.text: How are you doing today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: hello I am ok how are you?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I am well, what's on your mind?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: well as I stated above my father passed last year and now due to finances we need to move. I am out of work due to Covid19 it is hard moving not being able to support my family
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So sorry to hear about your plight. Life is a roller coaster and sometimes it gets out of control, I hope things slow down so you can get things straightened out.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: thank you! I find myself so stressed then I get scared and depressed wondering what will the future hold will we be ok will we take another hit will I get sick will my Mother be ok
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I understand your concerns about being stressed, scared and depressed. The risk of family getting sick is certainly valid.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: it keeps me up at night and I cant seem to get away form it even for a moment
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I too worry about things I feel I cannot control, the lack of sleep due to this just makes it worse so I try to think of positive things, but its hard.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yes and its always in the back of my mind burning. Like don't be to happy because things are going to fail
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Its hard to stop those negative thoughts, but the first step is sharing your feelings with others and talking about it. You are now on your way to healing.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It does help to talk about it with someone who doesn't judge
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can see in your words how stressed you are and troubled.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: This whole covid thing makes it 10 times worse
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: May I suggest that you seek some face to face support from a best friend or close family member.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: easier said then done I'm high risk so I have been social distancing
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Its still possible. Social distancing, six feet away but in maybe your backyard or even a park away from others so you can talk with some degree of confidence that its private. Just being around another person is so very supportive and positive. Please try.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: maybe but I need to be carful plus honest I dont want many people to know about my feelings
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: True. Remember, you are not the only one facing these troubles, others are tackling it too. Try also to google online support groups on Reddit and blogs for additional assistance and suggestions from those who faced it and succeeded. Doing what others did to overcome it means not having to reinvent the whole process on your own.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: maybe an online chat group
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That's the way to go. Keep seeking help. The right solution is there for you. Now you have a plan to get started.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: well I don't know if its a plan but an idea just knowing I'm not alone helps
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, it a problem so many people are facing.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My own family members are facing this too.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yes I know and with covid so many are depressed stressed and sad
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I read a few articles on Psychology today website that might help you also. They discuss how to control stress and overcome depression in this world of COVID. Written by some doctors and they are free to read.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: thanks I will have to look online take your suggestion
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You are welcome. You are on your way.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: thank you for your kind words
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It was my pleasure.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I will look online for the info you suggested I will see if maybe I can talk to a friend if we can do safely thanks again
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: I would like to get an online job  but it is very competitive.

dialog.text: I feel obligated to help you this Christmas Night.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hello Hello
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Who am I currently speaking with?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am Bob, your Christmas Night therapist and helper.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I hope I can assist you this Christmas Night.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It takes courage to tell how you are feeling.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hello Bob, nice to meet you
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I would like to talk but not sure if I can I will try
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How can I help you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am a caregiver and i can only come back and forth
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Please do your best. That is all I can expect.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Can you elaborate? What do you mean by that?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: You're doing great by contributing to your own cause on Christmas Night.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Do you like Christmas cookies?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My main job started so i am in this room an at the same time i wan to do mTurk and take care of them]
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Bob has some jelly cookies for you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I feel good asking you about how I can give you true insights on life.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: You made the right decision to join and discuss your feelings. Do you like the Christmas Holidays?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I can suggest Uber or Lyft or Door Dash or Grub Hub for you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I feel that you can earn and not be so sad and depressed this holiday.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am baking cookies for others, so don't feel sad. Maybe I can cheer you up with chocolate chip cookies.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am here to help you in soooo many ways.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: that is wonderful
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I love chocolate chip cookie
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: thanks for your encouragemnt
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I think that already helped,e
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yes, it is. I love chocoalate chip.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Do you have the chance to make Christmas Cookies?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Perhaps you could bake some using Bob's Xmas Cookie Recipe and share the joy that Christmas brings to the World.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Would you be interested?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: not today but sometime this week.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: oh nice 1
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: yes please
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Cooking cookies for others is a great way to cheer up. You could also create a small business by making your own type of cookies.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I made oatmeal cookie last week. I love baking
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: wonderful, i would pay $ to buy Bob's cookie
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You said you love baking? Well, other people who see you love to cook will get Joy from you. : )
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: nice, thank you
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I feel good to share my insights.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: yes I love it. I put 2 cups of sugar all the time.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: 2 sticks ofbutter
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Did you need any other insights from me to be glad?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I feel that being a professional baker my be the right career for you!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am full, and I am good
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: thanks it was great to talk to you Bob, Xmas couselor
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Do you need help with anything else?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I will think about it
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: im good, have a good evening
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I feel that you are on your way to a new cooking career.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: turned in ex gf to cps for giving her kids drugs.

dialog.text: Hello! Hope you are doing well. How may I assist you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: my recent ex gf gave her daughters drugs while on a video chat with me. While being very dishonest in our relationship, i am devestated about the truth of all of it now that its over. I really loved her. and her kids. we had some great times. I turned her in for giving her kids drugs as thats not okay.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: today im super sad. i dont have any motivation. I dont want to really be around, and im trapped in my thoughts with everything. i had to move to get away from her stalking me. now im in a new place trying to find a job and get set up here. Its difficult to start over.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: its a pretty intense situation i admit.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You are girlfriend is giving drugs to hew own kids. Did I get it right?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That is what she did. Among many other things.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That is really intense, unacceptable. I am feeling sorry for the poor little girl and you. It looks like there is something wrong with her. I can understand what you are going through.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Its a difficult time. I want to do nothing. It feels very bleek right now worrying about finances and getting set up in a new state.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It must be hard time for you. You should not worry about her. You should think about your job and the poor girl who is trapped with her.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: her daughters now both live with their dads. so thats taken care of, he kids are safer and better off. I however am devastated that the whole relationship wound up a lie and the whole thing has me really in a bad place mentally.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I felt the same way when I broke up with my friend for some pathetic things which she did. The good part is girls are safe now. Give some time to yourself. Time will heal everything.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thats a hard light to see at the end of the tunnel when things are bleek.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: im not sure what else to do.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: My mind runs away a bit right now, its just all stress ful
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So sorry to hear about that. You should indulge yourself in some activities like yoga or meditation.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: talk to your family and friends and go to them for a while. It will help you and you can come out of it.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Finding a better job.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: might be a more productive task.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You will get one soon. Keep working on. My best wishes are there with you. Time never stay the same.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: you dont want to continue to talk
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: No, that is not the case. You can talk as much as you want.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I see. i thought you had left.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: No I am hear and thinking of you and trying to figure out how can you come out of it.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: one of my friends cheated on her boyfriend.

dialog.text: Hi can you help me with my problem?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Hello. What's on your mind?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm disgusted with my friend for cheating on her boyfriend. Am I right to feel this way?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Your feelings are valid, no matter what they are.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Why do you think you're disgusted with her?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Because she's not acting the way she should be acting.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Her boyfriend is a nice guy so he doesn't deserve this treatment
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It sounds like she did something you find really immoral.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Is their relationship generally pretty good, to your knowledge?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah, but I'm also thinking it's not my business. I should just stay out of it.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Well I thought it was good until that happened. He doesn't know. So I just feel gross around them.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Have you talked to your friend about what she did?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah, she doesn't really care because she's not going to tell him. I'm questioning whether I should still be friends with her.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You're definite right to be questioning if this is the sort of person you want to be friends with.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It's hard to stop thought because we work at the same place.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: though..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: If her behavior is getting to you like this, I definitely suggest you try to keep some distance from her as much as you can.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah, I've been trying to, but she's always talking to me
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It might be a good idea to explain why you're upset with her, even though that's likely to upset her.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I guess, but I'd rather just avoid her.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm thinking if I ignore her then she
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: she'll get the hint
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can definitely understand wanting to avoid a confrontation.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah, I realize she's quite selfish so confronting her wouldn't help.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What do you think you can do to minimize your contact with her?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Just not respond to her messages and avoid the areas she's in
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: That sounds like a good plan.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Is that ghosting?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What one person calls ghosting, someone else can call looking out for yourself.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: It sounds like she knows why you're upset with her and would be able to understand why you're choosing not to talk to her.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: If she's not interested in listening to you or thinking about what she's done, then you need to be doing what is best for you in cutting her out.
dialog.speaker: sys

situation: I'm fearful of where I'll be living in the future.

dialog.text: I've tried this before and there wasn't anyone on the support side...
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I also tried to be the supporter but I think the screen froze at some point. I couldn't complete that side. So, I'm trying this again. Not sure if I got credit for the others.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Hoping I won't be punished with a rejection for talking to myself.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Hello how are you? I am here to support you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Oh, hi! Thank you.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I was just talking to myself. lol No one showed up the last few times I tried to do this.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: How can I help support you today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I know these are tough times and we all need to be heard.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm just looking for someone new to talk to. I don't really feel like I can express my actual feelings in my current living arrangement.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I understand. I have had to stay by myself for most of the year due to the pandemic. That has been hard.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I've heard the pandemic has affected a lot of people. I'm always alone anyway...or with my roommate,so I haven't noticed much of a difference.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It's difficult when we have absolutely nothing in common.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Have you tried different games that help you get to know each other? Maybe try a movie or series. I loved Sweet Magnolia's on Netflix.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm mainly worried that she'll throw me out of the house and I'll have no where to live.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh god forbid we watch a movie. She's too obsessed with CNN to watch anything else.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: She's become brainwashed by the tabloid media...
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh my goodness. The good thing is there is a moratorium on evictions so she would not be able to do that legally. CNN can be overwhelming. Try giving her some type of distraction. Suggest yoga or some type of bonding.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I think 24/7 news is problematic but here to stay.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I actually do yoga every evening. She hates it. I'm living in her home without a lease, so I wonder if she can just tell me to leave.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I can't imagine why anyone would want to watch the news for more than to just catch up (If you like lies and nonsense)
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: As long as you have property there she would have to formally evict you. That is the good news.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: That is good news. Thanks for letting me know that.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I think it is best to stick with a short local news report.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My pleasure. So many people are worried about losing their place to stay but thankfully most are protected due to the pandemic.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I just found mturk. I just started here. Any advice as to what to do? I've mainly just been doing surveys. I'm not good at the small tasks.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Check Youtube videos on using Panda's. It will help you make more money. I have done over 750,000 hits.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Oh wow, that's amazing! I've done this particular hit 3 times...I've only found a person once though. I will definitely check out the videos. thank you!
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What are pandas? Or is it too hard to explain?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: You are welcome. Panda's help you keep grabbing hits. You can store 25 at a time.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Oh, I see. Great! Thanks so much for chatting with me and for the advice.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It's been nice to have someone new to vent to. :)
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Have a great night and take care of yourself. It has been a pleasure.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Thank you, you too!
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: I'm failing my classes and I'm on scholarship

dialog.text: hi I need help. I'm under academic stress
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What are you stressed about?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am failing one of my classic.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I'm worried about my scholarship
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh, Covid is really having a negative affect on a lot of students, right now. Has school from home had anegative affect on you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah, I feel like I can't focus because I'm back home with my family and I just feel like there are so many distractions.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: It's interesting that you find being home more distracting than being away in a dorm.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeah thats really the reason I wanted to go away from college. I dont really have my own space when I'm here.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: People just come in and out of my room as they please in spite of how busy I am.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Yeah sometimes families can struggle with the idea of boundaries.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I also went away to school for similar reasons, but I actually found college life way more distracting tbh.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Have you told your family about the issues your having?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I honestly am worried that they will be disappointed. Maybe that's crazy. I just remember how proud they were when I got this scholarship. I don't want them to blame me.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: OK, that makes sense.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Have you spoken tried speaking to your teachers
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yeeah thats why im not officially failed. My teacher gave me an extention on my final.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So, I'm working on it, but i just can't focus.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Okay, then I think you need to find a place you can claim for yourself.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Either you can tell set up a study schedule with your parents and request to not be contacted during that time frame, then if they don't seem to have the ability to abide by that, you could try the outdoor seating of a starbucks or even an ikea or library.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I actually was thinking of going somewhere else to study. but i actually like the idea of a schedule better. I will try that first. Thank you.
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: Iam facing a lot of academic pressure to coplete the degree on time..

dialog.text: Hi..how are you doing today
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hi..Iam doing good..how are you
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Iam good..thank you..Iam here to help you about the emotional support you need.Tell me what you want to talk about?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Iam in final year of university and iam unable to complete the studies
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh I can relate to that,what is been stopping you from completing your work.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Iam a mother of 2 year old son and he is giving me a hard time to finish my work..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh..Is it possible that your husband helps you in taking care of your toddler..
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My husband is having full time job and he has to travel an hour to get to work..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh I can understand that..is there any chance that you can ak your parents to help?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: My parents live in another country and they cannot come here to my place because they dont have a valid visa..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh.without a visa i dont think they can enter in to the country..I can see the pain you are going through..
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Is there any other option for me to consider?
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I think if you can go for hiring a personal nanny..if you can afford it..What do you say?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I am little low on budget and cannot afford a nanny for my kid..or i cannot afford day care centers..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Oh that is a problem..ok you can try for applying child care assistance provided by the government to help you take care of your expenses..can you do it?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I think i can search for it and work on it..This is a good idea..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: yeah you can call to local government agencies or any social welfare organizations to help you on this..and I think you will find a solution to your problem..
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: sure..thank you for your help..I really appreciate it..
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: happy to help..I hope you will be feeling better soon..bye..
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: bye,,Stay safe and healthy in this pandemic..
dialog.speaker: usr

situation: I recently left my job because of a toxic environment but now I'm having trouble finding another and I'm running out of money.

dialog.text: Hello!
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Hello. Thanks for helping me today.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: No problem! How can I help you?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I'm feeling anxious about finding work and and impatient with the application process at many places I"ve applied.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: So from what I am understanding, you have been applying for jobs and you are having anxiety about finding one and waiting through the application process.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes thats right. I keep trying and feel like I"m not getting anywhere.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: Just from the few messages we have shared I can tell how anxious this is making you.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: Yes. I think that I might have to try to find a different type of work than I"m used to and I'm not sure I'll be good at trying something new.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: I just recently went through a layoff at my company, and I had the same situation trying to find another job. It is very stressful.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I wish that I could get more of a reason than just a denial of my application. I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong and most companies won't give any feedback.
dialog.speaker: usr

dialog.text: What have you done to reach out for feedback from the companies? Often it helps to send e-mails or make phone calls to have them give you some feedback.
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: I haven't tried reaching out. Most of the places I"ve been applying are huge corporations with no one to call at HR. Maybe I should try to apply somewhere locally and see if I have better luck. At least then I could talk to a person.
